title: A Letter to My Mom
description: Including letters from Melissa Rivers, Shania Twain, will.i.am, Christy Turlington, and Kristin ChenowethÂ Just in time for Mother's Day, the next book in the A Letter to My series (after A Letter to My Dog and A Letter to My Cat ) takes on mothers, with celebrities and civilians writing letters of gratitude and admiration to the women who raised them, alongside gorgeous, intimate photos.
author: Lisa Erspamer
